subject: Cruelty to Animals
Football
Animals
Sneakers
lead_paragraph: Nike said it had no plans to dump Michael Vick from its roster of endorsers, despite a request to cut ties with Vick over alleged ties to dogfighting.
snippet: Nike said it had no plans to dump Michael Vick from its roster of endorsers, despite a request to cut ties with Vick over alleged ties to dogfighting.
